string.value: When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Nightmare#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. Or is it?
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...
Thank you! Once you have destroyed 50 of them come back to me! I will be here waiting...
No! You must help me! I beg you... The Prendergast name must not be sullied!

You have destroyed 50 of the Nightmares! These horses were specially crafted after watching how my dear daughter fell asleep so soundly rocking on them. Such a shame that they should now take the form of evil dreams.
Take this hammer... it is my pride and joy. I specially crafted it to help me with all aspects of toymaking. It has served me well for many years.

Please, you can't stop now. Help me destroy my former creations... for every 50 Psycho Jacks, Nightmares, or Sophilia Dolls you destroy, you will be rewarded! We can't let any of them escape the house... what will the children think if they were to see these monstrosities come out of the Prendergast Toy Factory?
